text: Livraison trop tardive , et mauvaise impression sur les plats. A revoir le service :)

In the worse sushi I ate.  Rice super dry, sushi poorly wrapped so they decomposed all the time. Fish wasn't fresh, there's one roll I couldn't eat at all, wasn't fresh at all... very disappointing...

Très bon restaurant de sushis à proximité du marché Jean-Talon. Belle variété de sushis, pleins de saveur, beaucoup d'originalité pour les rouleaux et pour les pizza sushis. J'ai adoré les sushis avec les fruits (fraises et ananas).   J'ai pris pour apporter et le service était efficace et rapide!  Le seul petit point négatif: les sushis n'étaient pas roulés assez serré et ils se cassaient.   Je vous le recommande!

When I am too lazy to leave my place and I am craving sushi, which let's face it, is often, I call 2K Fusion because they are super nice on the phone or if you're going full hermit, you can easily order online via the resto Montreal site. The prices are pretty good and they make everything fresh as you order it, no pre-packaged rolls here. The delivery is quick and they have a good variety, especially for us non-meat eaters.  That said, whenever I walk by this place, which is daily, there is almost no one ever inside, so it looks like a front or something. Take out only as far as I'm concerned!
